channel.title: U.S. Police Shooting News Tracker
channel.description: Automated news aggregation tracking police-involved shootings in the United States

item.title: Suspect killed after allegedly opening fire on 2 Massachusetts cops with a fully automatic handgun: Police - ABC News
item.description: Suspect killed after allegedly opening fire on 2 Massachusetts cops with a fully automatic handgun: PoliceABC News Fall River man shot dead by police after shooting 2 officers, DA saysBoston.com Fall River man shot by police had 'violent history' of drugs and…

item.title: 1 sent to hospital following officer-involved shooting in Hickory
item.description: Officers are on leave and a suspect is in the hospital after a shooting outside a church.

item.title: Funeral underway for Gwinnett officer killed in the line of duty: ‘We’re grateful for his sacrifice’
item.description: Officer Pradeep Tamang was shot last weekend while investigating a fraud complaint. Master police officer David Reed was also critically injured in the shooting.

item.title: Police investigating officer-involved shooting at apartment in northeast Atlanta
item.description: The Atlanta Police Department is investigating an officer-involved shooting in northeast Atlanta.

item.title: Good Morning, News: MultCo DA Doesn't Wanna FAFO, Police Shooting in the Pearl, Breaking: Democracy Dies in Darkness, and Shorting the Bitcoin Economy
item.description:

item.title: The Mamdani-Tisch Relationship Isn’t Built to Last
item.description: A police shooting was the first test of the uneasy equilibrium between Mayor Zohran Mamdani and NYPD Commissioner Jessica Tisch. It certainly won’t be the last.

item.title: Senior Russian officer shot in Moscow in apparent assassination attempt
item.description: An unidentified individual has shot Lieutenant General Alekseyev before fleeing the scene, authorities say.

item.title: Man Fatally Shot By Police in NW Portland
item.description:
Police say the victim tried to shoot security guards at a grocery store five days earlier, leaving behind a shotgun with shells containing "threatening" messages naming Donald Trump.
by Courtney Vaughn
Portland Police officers shot and killed a man …

item.title: Pilot, trooper killed in helicopter crash during officer-involved shooting
item.description: A helicopter responding to assist officers in Arizona with an active shooter situation crashed, killing both the pilot and a trooper who was a paramedic on board, authorities said.

item.title: Winnipeg officer on scene when Eishia Hudson was killed tells inquest he thought he'd be hit by stolen vehicle
item.description: A Winnipeg officer who was on the scene of a fatal police shooting of 16-year-old Eishia Hudson told an inquest into her fatal shooting by police he thought his life was in danger.

item.title: Mayor Mamdani Gets His First Big Test And All Sides In Officer-Involved Shooting Aren’t Happy With Him
item.description: New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani is catching heat for trying to play both sides of an officer-involved shooting.

item.description: Terrifying bodycam footage emerged this week showing the moment an NYPD officer shot a person in self-defense, prompting an outlandish reaction from New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani. The post Pulse-Pounding Body Cam Footage Shows the Moment NYPD Officer Sho…

item.title: Police helicopter crashes in Arizona after shooting involving officer
item.description: A police helicopter crashed near the scene of what authorities in Flagstaff, Arizona called "an active officer-involved shooting investigation," according to police in Page, Arizona.

item.title: Heart-pounding bodycam footage shows moment NYPD cop shoots knife-wielding man with ‘history of mental issues’
item.description: The Jan. 26 police shooting of schizophrenic man Jabez Chakraborty has prompted backlash from the family, and fueled a renewed push from Mayor Zohran Mamdani for his proposed Department of Community Safety to deal with mental health crises.

item.title: Inside Minneapolis’s ICE Watch Network - One of the city’s protest organizations stoked a raging fire.
item.description: n less than a month, two “ICE watchers” have been shot and killed by immigration enforcement agents in Minneapolis. On January 24, a federal agent shot and killed 37-year-old Alex Pretti, a Veterans Affairs ICU nurse. His death follows that of Renée Good, a 3…

item.title: Alex Pretti’s death ruled homicide after Minneapolis shooting by federal agents
item.description: The death of Alex Pretti, the Minneapolis man killed by federal agents, has been ruled a homicide, the Hennepin County medical examiner’s office said. Pretti was shot Jan. 24 during a chaotic encounter with federal immigration officers in Minneapolis. Citing …

item.title: Arizona man accused of human smuggling is a repeat offender who once 'threw rocks' at Army helicopter: docs
item.description: Suspected human smuggler shot by federal agents near Arizona border is repeat offender, officials say. Patrick Schlegel allegedly fired at agents.

item.title: Shooting in Georgia hotel room leaves 1 officer killed, another seriously wounded: 'Unprovoked attack'
item.description: A Georgia police officer was killed and another was wounded after a suspect allegedly opened fire in a hotel room as he was being questioned.

item.title: Police officer killed, another critically wounded in shooting at Georgia hotel
item.description: Gunfire broke out after two officers were dispatched on a call reporting fraud.

item.title: There’s A Reason Many Police Dept’s Ban Shooting At Moving Vehicles: It Saves Lives Without Putting Officers In Greater Danger
item.description: Minneapolis is once again the focus of debates about violence involving law enforcement after an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer shot and killed Renee Nicole Good, a 37-year-old mother, in her car. The incident quickly prompted dueling narratives.…
